main

Class ApplicationInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.ApplicationInstance

  • public final class ApplicationInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an instance of this Settlers of Catan application. Because this class follows the Singleton-Pattern, only one instance of this class can be created per application.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeLocale(java.util.Locale newLocale)
      Changes the language of the game by creating a new bundle with the given locale.
      javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding createStringBinding(java.lang.String key)
      Creates a StringBinding to bind the textProperty of a Label to the bundleProperty, that is the language, of this application instance.
      javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<java.util.ResourceBundle> getBundleProperty()
      Getter for the Property of the ResourceBundle containing the languages.
      static ApplicationInstance getInstance()
      Returns the one instance of this class.
      java.util.Locale getLocale()
      Returns the locale.
      Player getPlayer()
      Returns the Player controlled by the User associated with this instance of the application.
      User getUser()
      Returns the User associated with this instance of the application.

      • createStringBinding

        public javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding createStringBinding(java.lang.String key)
        Creates a StringBinding to bind the textProperty of a Label to the bundleProperty, that is the language, of this application instance.
        Parameters:
        key - the key value of the bundle the property is bound to.
        Returns:
        the String binding.
